objects.name: Acquire OSINT data sets and information
objects.description: Open source intelligence (OSINT) provides free, readily available information about a target while providing the target no indication they are of interest.  Such information can assist an adversary in crafting a successful approach for compromise. (Citation: RSA-APTRecon)

external_references.description: Rotem Kerner. (2015, October). RECONNAISSANCE: A Walkthrough of the “APT” Intelligence Gathering Process. Retrieved March 1, 2017.

objects.x_mitre_detectable_by_common_defenses_ex: This activity is indistinguishable from legitimate business uses and easy to obtain.
objects.x_mitre_difficulty_for_adversary_explana: Possible to gather digital intelligence about a person is easily aided by social networking sites, free/for fee people search engines, and publicly available information (e.g., county databases on tickets/DUIs).
